participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and health-conscious, enjoys physical activities and seeks to stay fit.
participant_1.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. eating is something i do when i'm bored.
